column1: The most popular form of government is ____. (monarchy/dictatorship/democracy)
In a monarchy, absolute power rests with the ____. (citizens of the country/ king or queen/ electde representatives)
In a democracy, people elect their representatvies, through the process of _____(laws/protests/elections).
The right to vote is called ____(franchise/equality/democracy)
The two types of democracy are ____(direct democracy and indirect democracy/direct democracy and representative democracy/monarchy and democracy)"
